page.title: 10Recreation continued.
page.content: The Gelt Woods are a favourite place for walking. As well as local people, many visitors to the area enjoy this amenity. Another well used walk is the 'Dandy' where the railway lines were lifted after the track between Brampton Junction and the town was no longer used. There are a few houses without a garden. Most of them a well kept and have a good variety of flowers and shrubs. The allotments just off the Warwick Road are well used for the growing of vegetables. Leek growing for show in competition is very popular in this area.
